name: Tomato
watering_notes: Soil should always be kept moist,Water every few days in the morning,Water need is increased directly after repotting
fertilizing_notes: Fertilize soil before plantingFertilize every 2 weeks when plants are youngAfterwards only fertilize every 3-4 weeksAvoid high nitrogen fertilizer
pruning_notes: Remove leaves and stems near the bottom,Remove side shoots before they get big
additional_notes: Use support stalk so they don't fall overWhen repotting
make sure the lowest pair of leaves is fully buried to encourage root growth
